name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
name_original: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
description:
The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Turbine Entertainment Software. It came out on 24-04-2007. Turbine Entertainment Software published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar on PC.
